name: Hungry Space Cats
description:
We need your help!

Hungry SPACE CATS are eating everything.

Each week they come here to eat our PLANET itself!

To stop them we started providing TOP MEALS, made from our planet.

But we need YOU to make these special meals! We will pay you for each meal.

If you can feed them we will be able to rest in peace. "

You are our only hope.

INSTRUCTIONS!

Click on the buttons to make or give the food to the SPACE CATS.

Careful! 

Most things consume ENERGY but Oxygen and Energy generators consume CASH!

Don't let your ENERGY or Oxygen finish!

Source code

https://github.com/GabrielStrzal/hungry-space-cats
